title: AtomoS 🎮
description: This game was made during a Ludum Dare - Game Jam with the Unity game-engine.

title: Wizzard IO 🎮
description: Small online multiplay game developed with friends.

title: Schnitzeljagt AR 📱
description: The goal of this project was a virtual scavanger hunt through the schoolbuilding. The idea was to show new students around the school in a fun way, by taking part in a real live scavanger hunt, with a virtual overlay.

title: Monitoring a Building Automation Setup
description: This project shows, that it is possbile to monitor building automation networks with a network monitoring tools, meant for IT-Networks.

title: Animalfarm Simulation in a Console App (WIP)
